title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7312.9 - Storage of clothing and bedding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7312.9 - Storage of clothing and bedding

State Regulations

All clothing and bedding, stored within the facility, shall
be maintained in a safe and sanitary manner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7312.9

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
